ThingDef.label: machnorian egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized machnorian chicken egg. Sure, you can eat them, but they are much, much better when refined into Yayo.

ThingDef.label: machnorian egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized machnorian chicken egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. Sure, you can eat them, but they are much, much better when refined into Yayo.
